metadata.description: Meet Mr. Fisk. He's a member of the covert S.U.B.S.T.I.T.U.T.E. division of the Board of Education. His mission? To quickly and quietly handle any and all supernatural, inexplicable or just plain weird occurrences at schools. It's MEN IN BLACK meets Mr. Holland's Opus! It's the X-Files meets Dead Poet's Society! It's an action-packed romp that sets the stage for the subsequent mini-series and leaves the reader pondering just what Mr. Fisk's briefcase contains.
metadata.name: FISK the S.U.B.S.T.I.T.U.T.E
